title: #50: I Protest | Don Jeffries
description:
The host of “I Protest” on Truth Frequency Radio joins us to discuss the state of the nation as he sees it from his perch in the nation’s capital.

The social unrest in America could be manufactured by outside forces that have a vested interest in keeping the people divided, but could it also be the inevitable result of decades of systemic abuse of power and a culture of discrimination laid out by the police force?

Don Jeffries has spent the last four decades watching and writing about the direction America is headed, and he helps to unpack whether what we are experiencing is a temporary bump in the road, or the beginning of a different version of the United States.
